verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Before the throne of God above

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I have a strong and perfect plea

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: A great High Priest whose name is love

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Whoever lives and pleads for me

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: My name is graven on His hands

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: My name is written on His heart

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: I know that while in heaven He stands

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: No tongue can bid me thence depart

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: When Satan tempts me to despair

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: And tells me of the guilt within

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines: Upward I look and see Him there

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines: Who made an end to all my sin

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: Because a sinless Savior died

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: My sinful soul is counted free

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines: For God the Just is satisfied

verse.name: v4d
verse.lines: To look on Him and pardon me

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines: Behold, Him there the risen lamb

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines: My perfect, spotless righteousness

verse.name: v5c
verse.lines: The great unchangeable I am

verse.name: v5d
verse.lines: The King of glory and of grace

verse.name: v6a
verse.lines: One with Himself I cannot die

verse.name: v6b
verse.lines: My life is purchased by HIs blood

verse.name: v6c
verse.lines: My life is hid with Christ on High

verse.name: v6d
verse.lines: With Christ my Savior and my God

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: My life is hid with Christ on High
